bibl.title: The Wanderings of the Thestorids (Stesichorus fr. 193.16-22 PMGF).
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XXIX, 2506 (= M.-P.3 1950; LDAB 4826), fr. 26, col. i, 16-22 = P.M.G., fr. 193. - Réflexions consécutives à l'étude de: Patrick J. Finglass, Demophon in Egypt, ZPE 184 (2013) pp. 37-50.
bibl.seg: Gianbattista D'Alessio, The Wanderings of the Thestorids (Stesichorus fr. 193.16-22 PMGF).
